items.name: Sarah M.
items.content: Domina has been absolutely incredible with our son Jake who has autism. She understands his needs and routine in a way that gives us peace of mind when we need respite care.

items.name: Michael & Lisa T.
items.content: Having someone who truly gets what we go through as special needs parents has been life-changing. Domina's care and understanding are exceptional.

items.name: Jennifer K.
items.content: As a single parent of a child with special needs, finding trustworthy care is so difficult. Domina not only provides excellent care but does it with genuine compassion and understanding.

items.name: David & Emma R.
items.content: Domina's parent-to-parent approach makes all the difference. She gets it in a way that other caregivers just don't. Our daughter is always happy and well-cared for.

items.name: Maria C.
items.content: Professional, caring, and incredibly reliable. Domina has given our family the respite we desperately needed while ensuring our son receives the specialized attention he requires.
